title: Bare [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Deborah Strutt, Liz Baulch and Wild Iris Productions
brief_description: There are misunderstandings aplenty in this award-winning Australian short when two gay boys accidentally catch their lesbian neighbours in an early morning clinch. High density living in all its revealing glory. Cast includes Madeleine Swain, Maria Theodorakis, Luke Elliot, David Treddinick and Esme Melville.
